GeneDef.label: abysmal slayer
GeneDef.description: It doesn't matter what carriers of this gene are fighting, they just always seem to have an extremely difficult time killing things.

GeneDef.label: terrible slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extreme difficulties killing other beings, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take lives, even artificial ones, or just general physical incapability.

GeneDef.label: extremely bad slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have significant difficulty killing other beings, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take lives, even artificial ones, or just general physical incapability.

GeneDef.label: very bad slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have major issues when trying to kill other beings, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take lives, even artificial ones, or just general physical incapability.

GeneDef.label: bad slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues when trying to kill other beings, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take lives, even artificial ones, or just general physical incapability.

GeneDef.label: somewhat bad slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have some issues when trying to kill other beings, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take lives, even artificial ones, or just general physical incapability.

GeneDef.label: somewhat good slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know some of the weak points of any enemy they face, making it easier to slay their enemies.

GeneDef.label: good slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know a lot of the weak points of any enemy they face, making it easier to slay their enemies.

GeneDef.label: very good slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know most of the weak points of any enemy they face, making it easier to slay their enemies.

GeneDef.label: very good slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know every weak point of any enemy they face, making it significantly easier to slay their enemies.

GeneDef.label: amazing slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know every weak point of any enemy they face and the ability to predict where the enemy will move next with a very low accuracy rate, making it significantly easier to slay their enemies.\n\nAlite's note: Predictive ability doesn't really exist or do anything, it's just some fluff text that I use to be able to claim this gene makes complete sense.
